name: EnablePlayerCameraTarget
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3.7 and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Toggle camera targeting functions for a player. Disabled by default to save bandwidth.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player to toggle camera targeting functions for.

params_body.name: enable
params_body.description: 1 to enable camera targeting functions and 0 to disable them.

return_values:
1: The function executed successfully. 

 0: The function failed to execute. The player is not connected.
related_fn:
GetPlayerCameraTargetVehicle: Get the ID of the vehicle a player is looking at.
 GetPlayerCameraTargetPlayer: Get the ID of the player a player is looking at.
 GetPlayerCameraFrontVector: Get the player's camera front vector
